column4: hi ! i need remote login my server  using one bash scripts   ,like # telnet 10.1.200.200   expect  login   send "<user>"   expect  "password" send "<password>"     , the problem is  how can i  hide the password in this scripts ,so other can  run this  scripts  but they can't see the password for the remote server
sorry for repeat , but i really need help

hi ! i need remote login my server  using one bash scripts   ,like # telnet 10.1.200.200   expect  login   send "<user>"   expect  "password" send "<password>"     , the problem is  how can i  hide the password in this scripts ,so other can  run this  scripts  but they can't see the password for the remote server
the quick answer is you can't, use ssh keys
